name: In re ESTATE of Constance CHIARA, Deceased. Appeal of Joseph E. CHIARA

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
parties: In re ESTATE of Constance CHIARA, Deceased. Appeal of Joseph E. CHIARA.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Decree, Pa., 359 A.2d 756, affirmed.
Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Leslie B. Handler, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Paul E. Clouser, Harrisburg, for appellee Gloria C. Murphy-
casebody.head_matter:
387 A.2d 666
In re ESTATE of Constance CHIARA, Deceased. Appeal of Joseph E. CHIARA.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 22, 1978.
Decided June 23, 1978.
Leslie B. Handler, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Paul E. Clouser, Harrisburg, for appellee Gloria C. Murphy-
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
